item.description:
Hello everyone,

My weekend plans got cancelled and anyone that knows me knows that is unaccepable for me to be doing nothing. I know it's last minute, but hopefully there are a few of you that might come over and want to play some games. :) I won't be cokking so it will be a buy chinese or pizza kind of night. So plan $7.00 for food. BYOB although I do have some stuff in the fridge I'd like to get rid of because it is starting to take over the fridge. So you are welcome to some of it - although the Sam adams is Marks. :) At any rate, bring a snacky or desserty food if you want but be prepared to take it home at the end of the night. If the weather is good I'd love to get the firepit going - I've got all that hurricane wood to burn.

Don;t forget the 1.00 Nina money.

I hope to see some of you on Friday.

 

Take care,

Margaret   

 

As always parking is on the street or CVS parking lot not on the side or frint of the house.

Allergy alert - I have a dog.
item.how_to_find_us: Open the door and walk in

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Games at Margueriiitttaaasss
